data.title: Prior Lake Savage Area Schools
data.meta_description: Home - Prior Lake Savage Area Schools
data.text:
Inspire and empower each student to reach their full potential. The School Board features Laker Pride during regular Board meetings to honor students and staff who bring that mission to life each day. Check here to meet our latest honorees.

Learn More

Our schools are the first district-wide E-STEM schools in the state of Minnesota.

Students develop real world problem-solving skills with hands-on projects in environmental education, science, technology, engineering and math.

Learn More

Our vision, mission, priorities and core beliefs were written with the help of our community and are designed to inspire and empower each student to reach their full potential.

Learn More
